text: I ve given up on myself but I m terrified of what my passing would do to those I care about I ve lost almost all motivation to want to better myself and I ve set myself up for failure and I can t go on knowing how others will view me  I m in my first year of College about to finish this week and the first and second semesters were basically polar opposites  First semester I did all my homework  tried to get a good amount of studying done for exams and I did well  Only problem was that I didn t feel any better than I do this semester where I barely did any of the assignments and barely passed most exams  I ve learned that no matter how much effort I try to put into anything it doesn t bring me anything in terms of happiness or fulfillment  My parents congratulated me on doing well my first semester but it meant pretty much nothing  I still went along questioning if anything I do would make me happy or would make my family proud or even just get me through life  I can t live life waking up everyday questioning wether or not I mean anything  So one day I made the attempt  Obviously didn t work but thankfully no one found out except my girlfriend who I told after she noticed I seemed less happy than usual  I guess I m better at pretending to happy than I thought  After telling her what I did she pulled me close and cried more than I ve ever seen her  It was heartbreaking and I couldn t help but wish I never said anything  She couldn t even sleep well that night as she started to cry even more  it took almost   hours to help her calm down  After seeing what the thought of losing me did to her I can t imagine what actually going through with it would do  I love her and my family with all my heart but I can t imagine life going on knowing that I may never feel accomplished  I just want everyone to be happy no matter what happens to me

text: Hey you  Yes  you  that part of yourself that is willing to listen Ok so  here we go  I know how is it to feel suicidal  Depressed  Sad  without being able to see the light in that tunnel  Without somebody being here willing to hear your screams  And in fact  I am still like this time from time  Yet I never cut myself  hit myself  or attempted to kill myself  Not because I am special  or because I just met some good friend  or you know  that unexpected happy turn in life  no  no  no I made a  choice  I made a choice to see the world where the world doesn t expect us to look at  I made a choice to understand the world and appreciate every form of life  including myself  for what it does  for how millions and millions of years of evolution assembled together this hands that write here  these eyes that read here  this body  of which Nature made it special  Now  should I just throw all of that away  just because I am stuck in my head  in my misconceptions  in my past or in my future  in my current  me   Suicide is a permanent solution to a temporary problem  You know  the more you think about those words  the more you realise you are your greatest project  Think about a future you  where that future you will tank the present you for taking that extra step  that extra tiny bit of force  to carry on the next day   If you believe in uncertainty  your whole life will be uncertain  The strenght to carry on it is always within you and nobody can take that from you  Nobody except yourself Cheers  Stay strong
summary: Suicide is a permanent solution to a temporary problem. If you believe in uncertainty, your whole life will be uncertain. Nobody can take that from you except yourself. Stay strong and be true to yourself.    .
cleaned: suicide permanent solution temporary problem believe uncertainty life uncertain stay strong true

text: Existing for others onlyAs title says   I have very dark suicidal thoughts  It all connects to feeling unloved or unlovable  Not just romantically  but via friendships and family  Ironically I actually have a few great friends who would probably do anything for me  but it s just not the same type of companionship as a real family  or a romantic one   I seem to fuck up everything great that comes along in my life  It s like I auto destruct and can t stop it while watching it happen  Then I try to heroically save it and fail  which pushes me back to the brink again   The only thing keeping me from ending it is not wanting to hurt those around me  My former fianc e had her last husband die suddenly  and as much as I m hurt by her ending things so abruptly  I still couldn t bring myself to ever make her feel that loss twice in a single lifetime  Same for her kids  which I essentially look at as my own   I could never do that to them  and it s literally my only lifeline  If not for saving them the pain  I would ve blown my brains out or overdosed quietly on pain meds already   I don t want to live  because I just don t see the point in it  You breathe  You eat  You sleep  The wild keeps turning with or without you  It all has no consequence  My life  has no consequence  No meaning  No fulfillment  Just pain  Endless pain

text: Im tiredI used to be so good at pretending I m okay  I had everyone fooled for years  Now it all seems to be catching up with me  I guess I don t really care any more if they think Im okay or not  Lately they ve been asking  and I tell them all the same thing  Im tired  I ve really been trying to give life a chance  I ve started working out  trying to eat healthier  go out and do things  I stopped cutting myself  I tried talking about it with a close friend  Hell  I even took a vacation from work to go see my best friend in another state  All things that are  in theory  supposed to help one feel better about life   I was going to wait until the end of this year to make a decision  I still might  but it s getting harder  No matter how hard I try to feel better  I just don t  Every time something in my life goes right  I have this sick feeling in my gut telling me it won t last  I feel so pathetic and weak all the time  I know it would hurt my mom if I kill myself  but I really don t care anymore  I don t care who it hurts  Im just tired   I never really talk about this kind of stuff  so maybe posting my thoughts here will be helpful I m not going to try anything soon  but I have a tentative date set  Maybe I ll wait until the end of the year  or maybe I wont  Like I said  I don t really care any more
summary: After years of pretending to be okay, depression is catching up with him. He's trying to change his lifestyle but it's getting harder. He has a tentative date set for a decision, but he might wait until the end of the year to make it.
cleaned: year pretend okay depression catch try change lifestyle get hard tentative date set decision wait end year
